trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of the Digital Signature Algorithm (DSA) must inherit.
trans-unit.target: 表示的数字签名算法 (DSA) 中的所有实现必须从中都继承的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: You can use the DSA class and derived classes to create digital signatures that help protect the integrity of your data.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 DSA 类和派生的类创建的数字签名来帮助保护你的数据的完整性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> provides an implementation of this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>提供此类的实现</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: To use a public-key system to digitally sign a message, the sender first applies a hash function to the message to create a message digest.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的公钥系统以数字方式签署一条消息，发送方将先于该消息以创建消息摘要应用哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: The sender then encrypts the message digest with the sender's private key to create the sender's personal signature.
trans-unit.target: 发件人然后使用以创建发件人的个人签名发件人的私钥加密此消息摘要。

trans-unit.source: Upon receiving the message and signature, the receiver decrypts the signature using the sender's public key to recover the message digest and hashes the message using the same hash algorithm that the sender used.
trans-unit.target: 在收到消息和签名，接收方使用发件人的公钥来恢复消息摘要解密签名，并使用发件人使用的同一个哈希算法对消息进行哈希处理。

trans-unit.source: If the message digest that the receiver computes exactly matches the message digest received from the sender, the receiver can assume that the message was not altered while in transit.
trans-unit.target: 如果接收方计算完全匹配的消息摘要消息摘要收到来自发件人，接收方可以假定该消息在传输过程中未被更改。

trans-unit.source: Note that a signature can be verified by anyone, because the sender's public key is common knowledge.
trans-unit.target: 请注意通过任何人都可以验证签名，这是因为发件人的公钥为常见的知识。

trans-unit.source: Newer asymmetric algorithms are available.
trans-unit.target: 较新的非对称算法都可用。

trans-unit.source: Consider using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> class, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa> class, or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman> class instead of the DSA class.
trans-unit.target: 请考虑使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>类、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa>类或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman>类而不是 DSA 类。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: Use DSA only for compatibility with legacy applications and data.
trans-unit.target: DSA 仅用于与旧的应用程序和数据的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports key lengths from 512 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此算法支持密钥长度为 512 位至 1024 位的 64 位的增量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default cryptographic object used to perform the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于执行非对称算法的默认加密对象。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic object used to perform the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 用于执行非对称算法的加密对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates the specified cryptographic object used to perform the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于执行非对称算法的指定加密对象。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>, use the name System.Security.Cryptography.DSA.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>，使用名称 System.Security.Cryptography.DSA。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: The name of the specific implementation of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: 特定实现的名称<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>使用。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic object used to perform the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 用于执行非对称算法的加密对象。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，将创建<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>指定数据的签名。

trans-unit.source: The data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 要进行签名的数据。

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 指定数据的数字签名。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, exports the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSAParameters"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，将导出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSAParameters"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 重新构造<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>通过 XML 字符串的对象。

trans-unit.target: The xmlString parameter is .

trans-unit.target: 格式 xmlString 参数无效。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, computes the hash value of a specified binary stream by using a specified hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，使用指定的哈希算法计算指定二进制流的哈希值。

trans-unit.target: 哈希二进制流。

trans-unit.target: 要用于数据进行哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The hashed data.
trans-unit.target: 经过哈希处理的数据。

trans-unit.source: A derived class must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, computes the hash value of a specified portion of a byte array by using a specified hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，使用指定的哈希算法计算字节数组的指定部分的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid by calculating the hash value of the specified data using the specified hash algorithm and comparing it to the provided signature.
